News

Ceilidh

November 26, 2013 admin

Friday 29th November
7pm-10pm
Partick Burgh Halls
Adults £4 Children £2
Max 3 children per adult
No unaccompanied children

TICKETS NOW ON SALE in the playground and via the Parent Council box. If you’re cutting it fine, can’t find your letter and are having difficulty catching Jane in the main playground or Louise in the P1 playground, contact Janeto reserve your tickets.

_ Remember one of the highlights for the children is the raffle. Please think of bringing a child-friendly prize to donate. Cold items for the mainly “kids party food” buffet also gratefully received. Bite-sized pieces go further! _
